name: a2a-agui-starter
description: Minimal starter template for building multi-agent applications with A2A Protocol and AG-UI

scripts.dev: concurrently --names "UI,Orch,Research,Analysis" --prefix-colors "cyan,gray,green,blue" "npm run dev:ui" "npm run dev:orchestrator" "npm run dev:research" "npm run dev:analysis"
scripts.dev-direct: concurrently --names "UI,DirectOrch,Research,Analysis" --prefix-colors "cyan,yellow,green,blue" "npm run dev:ui" "npm run dev:orchestrator-direct" "npm run dev:research" "npm run dev:analysis"
scripts.shutdown: powershell -Command "$ports = @(3000, 3001, 9100, 9101, 9102, 9103); foreach ($port in $ports) { $procs = Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort $port -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -ExpandProperty OwningProcess -Unique; foreach ($proc in $procs) { if ($proc -gt 0) { Write-Host \"Terminating process $proc on port $port\"; Stop-Process -Id $proc -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } } }"
